name: Top of the Vertical Shaft
down: You carefully lower yourself onto the first ledge below. It's going to be a long descent.
description: You stand at the edge of a vertical shaft that heads downward into darkness. With your flashlight you can see that there are copious handholds and ledges along the surface of it, leading downward into darkness. A passage leads out of the cave to the west, out onto the side of a black mountain.
